alert.note: Alert for Baxter (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Baxter County through 845 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arkawana, or 8 miles north of Mountain Home, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Arkawana... Fawn Park... Ozark Regional Airport... Gamaliel Landing... Midway in Baxter County... Clarkridge... Robinson Point Landing... Three Brothers... Gamaliel... Henderson... Norfork Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Boaters on Norfolk Lake should seek Safe Harbor.
